verses.verse: כִּ֗י <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> behold בַּיָּמִ֥ים <WH3117> For behold in those days הָהֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> those וּבָעֵ֣ת <WH6256> and in that time הַהִ֑יא <WH1931> he אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> When [אָשׁוּב כ] (אָשִׁ֛יב <WH7725> break ק) אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁב֥וּת <WH7622> the captivity יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah וִירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> and Jerusalem

וְקִבַּצְתִּי֙ <WH6908> I will also gather אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> all nations וְה֣וֹרַדְתִּ֔ים <WH3381> and will bring them down אֶל־ <WH413> to עֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> into the valley יְהֽוֹשָׁפָ֑ט <WH3092> of Jehoshaphat וְנִשְׁפַּטְתִּ֨י <WH8199> and will plead עִמָּ֜ם <WH5973> them שָׁ֗ם <WH8033> there עַל־ <WH5921> behalf עַמִּ֨י <WH5971> with them there for my people וְנַחֲלָתִ֤י <WH5159> and [for] my heritage יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> Whom פִּזְּר֣וּ <WH6340> whom they have scattered בַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> among the nations וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַרְצִ֖י <WH776> my land חִלֵּֽקוּ׃ <WH2505> and parted

וְאֶל־ <WH413> about עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> for my people יַדּ֣וּ <WH3032> And they have cast גוֹרָ֑ל <WH1486> lots וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> and have given הַיֶּ֙לֶד֙ <WH3206> a boy בַּזּוֹנָ֔ה <WH2181> for an harlot וְהַיַּלְדָּ֛ה <WH3207> a girl מָכְר֥וּ <WH4376> and sold בַיַּ֖יִן <WH3196> for wine וַיִּשְׁתּֽוּ׃ <WH8354> that they might drink

וְ֠גַם <WH1571> Moreover מָה־ <WH4100> what אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> you לִי֙ צֹ֣ר <WH6865> Yea and what have ye to do with me O Tyre וְצִיד֔וֹן <WH6721> and Zidon וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and all גְּלִיל֣וֹת <WH1552> and all the coasts פְּלָ֑שֶׁת <WH6429> Palestina הַגְּמ֗וּל <WH1576> your recompence אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you מְשַׁלְּמִ֣ים <WH7999> make amends עָלָ֔י <WH5921> and וְאִם־ <WH518> do גֹּמְלִ֤ים <WH1580> recompense אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you עָלַ֔י <WH5921> and קַ֣ל <WH7031> me swiftly מְהֵרָ֔ה <WH4120> [and] speedily אָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> will I return גְּמֻלְכֶ֖ם <WH1576> your recompense בְּרֹאשְׁכֶֽם׃ <WH7218> upon your own head

אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Since כַּסְפִּ֥י <WH3701> my silver וּזְהָבִ֖י <WH2091> and my gold לְקַחְתֶּ֑ם <WH3947> Because ye have taken וּמַֽחֲמַדַּי֙ <WH4261> pleasant things הַטֹּבִ֔ים <WH2896> my goodly הֲבֵאתֶ֖ם <WH935> and have carried לְהֵיכְלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1964> into your temples

וּבְנֵ֤י <WH1121> The children יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> also of Judah וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> and the children יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem מְכַרְתֶּ֖ם <WH4376> have ye sold לִבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> the sons הַיְּוָנִ֑ים <WH3125> to the Greeks לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> order הַרְחִיקָ֖ם <WH7368> that ye might remove them far מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> from גְּבוּלָֽם׃ <WH1366> from their border

הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> I am going מְעִירָ֔ם <WH5782> Behold I will raise מִן־ <WH4480> from הַ֨מָּק֔וֹם <WH4725> them out of the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> you מְכַרְתֶּ֥ם <WH4376> whither ye have sold אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> שָׁ֑מָּה <WH8033> them וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֥י <WH7725> them and will return גְמֻלְכֶ֖ם <WH1576> your recompence בְּרֹאשְׁכֶֽם׃ <WH7218> upon your own head

וּמָכַרְתִּ֞י <WH4376> And I will sell אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵיכֶ֣ם <WH1121> your sons וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֽוֹתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH1323> and your daughters בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> into the hand בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> of the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וּמְכָר֥וּם <WH4376> and they shall sell לִשְׁבָאיִ֖ם <WH7615> them to the Sabeans אֶל־ <WH413> about גּ֣וֹי <WH1471> to a people רָח֑וֹק <WH7350> far off כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for the LORD דִּבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> hath spoken ס

קִרְאוּ־ <WH7121> Proclaim זֹאת֙ <WH2063> likewise בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> ye this among the Gentiles קַדְּשׁ֖וּ <WH6942> Prepare מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> war הָעִ֙ירוּ֙ <WH5782> wake up הַגִּבּוֹרִ֔ים <WH1368> the mighty men יִגְּשׁ֣וּ <WH5066> draw near יַֽעֲל֔וּ <WH5927> let them come up כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> let all the men הַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> of war

כֹּ֤תּוּ <WH3807> Beat אִתֵּיכֶם֙ <WH855> your plowshares לַֽחֲרָב֔וֹת <WH2719> into swords וּמַזְמְרֹֽתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH4211> and your pruninghooks לִרְמָחִ֑ים <WH7420> into spears הַֽחַלָּ֔שׁ <WH2523> let the weak יֹאמַ֖ר <WH559> say גִּבּ֥וֹר <WH1368> I [am] strong אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I

ע֣וּשׁוּ <WH5789> Assemble וָבֹ֧אוּ <WH935> yourselves and come כָֽל־ <WH3605> all הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <WH1471> all ye heathen מִסָּבִ֖יב <WH5439> round about וְנִקְבָּ֑צוּ <WH6908> and gather yourselves together שָׁ֕מָּה <WH8033> there הַֽנְחַ֥ת <WH5181> to come down יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> O LORD גִּבּוֹרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1368> thither cause thy mighty ones

יֵע֙וֹרוּ֙ <WH5782> be wakened וְיַעֲל֣וּ <WH5927> and come up הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> Let the heathen אֶל־ <WH413> to עֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> to the valley יְהֽוֹשָׁפָ֑ט <WH3092> of Jehoshaphat כִּ֣י <WH3588> For שָׁ֗ם <WH8033> there אֵשֵׁ֛ב <WH3427> for there will I sit לִשְׁפֹּ֥ט <WH8199> to judge אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> all the heathen מִסָּבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

שִׁלְח֣וּ <WH7971> Put מַגָּ֔ל <WH4038> ye in the sickle כִּ֥י <WH3588> for בָשַׁ֖ל <WH1310> is ripe קָצִ֑יר <WH7105> for the harvest בֹּ֤אֽוּ <WH935> come רְדוּ֙ <WH3381> get you down כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for מָ֣לְאָה <WH4390> is full גַּ֔ת <WH1660> for the press הֵשִׁ֙יקוּ֙ <WH7783> overflow הַיְקָבִ֔ים <WH3342> the fats כִּ֥י <WH3588> for רַבָּ֖ה <WH7227> [is] great רָעָתָֽם׃ <WH7451> for their wickedness

הֲמוֹנִ֣ים <WH1995> Multitudes הֲמוֹנִ֔ים <WH1995> multitudes בְּעֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> in the valley הֶֽחָר֑וּץ <WH2742> of decision כִּ֤י <WH3588> for קָרוֹב֙ <WH7138> [is] near י֣וֹם <WH3117> for the day יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּעֵ֖מֶק <WH6010> in the valley הֶחָרֽוּץ׃ <WH2742> of decision
שֶׁ֥מֶשׁ <WH8121> The sun וְיָרֵ֖חַ <WH3394> and the moon קָדָ֑רוּ <WH6937> shall be darkened וְכוֹכָבִ֖ים <WH3556> and the stars אָסְפ֥וּ <WH622> shall withdraw נָגְהָֽם׃ <WH5051> their shining

וַיהוָ֞ה <WH3068> The LORD מִצִּיּ֣וֹן <WH6726> out of Zion יִשְׁאָ֗ג <WH7580> also shall roar וּמִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> from Jerusalem יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> and utter קוֹל֔וֹ <WH6963> his voice וְרָעֲשׁ֖וּ <WH7493> shall shake שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> and the heavens וָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> and the earth וַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> but the LORD מַֽחֲסֶ֣ה <WH4268> [will be] the hope לְעַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> of his people וּמָע֖וֹז <WH4581> and the strength לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וִֽידַעְתֶּ֗ם <WH3045> So shall ye know כִּ֣י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֤י <WH589> I am יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God שֹׁכֵ֖ן <WH7931> dwelling בְּצִיּ֣וֹן <WH6726> in Zion הַר־ <WH2022> mountain קָדְשִׁ֑י <WH6944> my holy וְהָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> become יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> then shall Jerusalem קֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> be holy וְזָרִ֥ים <WH2114> and there shall no strangers לֹא־ <WH3808> no יַֽעַבְרוּ־ <WH5674> pass through בָ֖הּ עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> more ס

וְהָיָה֩ <WH1961> become בַיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֜וּא <WH1931> he יִטְּפ֧וּ <WH5197> shall drop down הֶהָרִ֣ים <WH2022> [that] the mountains עָסִ֗יס <WH6071> new wine וְהַגְּבָעוֹת֙ <WH1389> and the hills תֵּלַ֣כְנָה <WH1980> will flow חָלָ֔ב <WH2461> with milk וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲפִיקֵ֥י <WH650> and all the rivers יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah יֵ֣לְכוּ <WH1980> will flow מָ֑יִם <WH4325> with waters וּמַעְיָ֗ן <WH4599> and a fountain מִבֵּ֤ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD יֵצֵ֔א <WH3318> shall come forth וְהִשְׁקָ֖ה <WH8248> and shall water אֶת־ <WH853> נַ֥חַל <WH5158> the valley הַשִּׁטִּֽים׃ <WH7851> of Shittim

מִצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> Egypt לִשְׁמָמָ֣ה <WH8077> shall be a desolation תִֽהְיֶ֔ה <WH1961> will become וֶאֱד֕וֹם <WH123> and Edom לְמִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> wilderness שְׁמָמָ֖ה <WH8077> shall be a desolate תִּֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> will become מֵֽחֲמַס֙ <WH2555> for the violence בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> [against] the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whose שָׁפְכ֥וּ <WH8210> because they have shed דָם־ <WH1818> blood נָקִ֖יא <WH5355> innocent בְּאַרְצָֽם׃ <WH776> in their land
וִיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> But Judah לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> for ever תֵּשֵׁ֑ב <WH3427> shall dwell וִירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> and Jerusalem לְד֥וֹר <WH1755> from generation וָדֽוֹר׃ <WH1755> to generation

וְנִקֵּ֖יתִי <WH5352> For I will cleanse דָּמָ֣ם <WH1818> their blood לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not נִקֵּ֑יתִי <WH5352> [that] I have not cleansed וַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for the LORD שֹׁכֵ֥ן <WH7931> dwelleth בְּצִיּֽוֹן׃ <WH6726> in Zion
